content: I am not able to provide current and specific recommendations. however, you can start your search by checking out some of the popular irish clothing stores and brands. some popular brands that sell traditional irish clothing include aran sweater market, inis crafts, and carraig donn. you can also find traditional irish clothing in many souvenir shops, particularly in locations with a high concentration of tourists, such as dublin, galway, and killarney. additionally, local markets and craft fairs often have vendors selling traditional irish clothing and may offer unique and handcrafted pieces. finally, as you travel through ireland, you may stumble upon local boutiques or shops that carry traditional irish clothing, which can be a great opportunity to find more unique and authentic items.
